content: ..ROUND#2, Date 07/10/23 - 13/10/2023..GUESSING MECHANICSEnter your guess in USD before 13th October 2023 @23:59 UTCRULES AND TERMS- To participate, you need to be a Sherbet player. If you don't have an account with us yet, please register using the provided link.- Each participant can make only one prediction during the specified round.- You must have at least 50 posts on Bitcointalk before August 31st.- Once submitted, you cannot edit your post.- Three winners will be determined based on the Bitcoin price at Coinmarketcap on October 20, 2023, at 10:00 UTC.- The closest predictions will receive $150, $50, and $50, respectively, in BTC or an equivalent currency set on your account.- Rewards will be sent to your Sherbet account and withdraw-able anytime.- Sherbet management reserves the right to edit, update, or cancel this game at any time.POST FORMATCode:Sherbet username:Prediction: $xx,xxx.xx

comments.body: Congratulations to the second round winners,Quote from: playsherbet on October 20, 2023, 03:55:51 PMHi, Sherbet Community20TH OCTOBER @10:00 UTC BITCOIN PRICE : $29,818.8First place #1 (-$1,089.91)Quote from: komisariatku on October 09, 2023, 03:37:36 AMSherbet username: rryuk_Prediction: $28,728.89Second place #2 (-$1,173.65)Quote from: PaulBf1 on October 09, 2023, 01:20:03 PMSherbet username: pauld4Prediction: $28,645.15Third place #3 (-$1,297.65)Quote from: Danydee on October 07, 2023, 02:28:17 AMSherbet username: nino11 Prediction: $28,521.15Congratulations to the winners, our team will send the prizes to your Sherbet accountRegards,Jt
